name: 彼特·布莱恩特
name_full: 彼特·布莱恩特 Peter Bryant
introduction: Peter James Bryant (born Aug. 5, 1961) is a veteran Canadian Actor best known for his film and television roles including his portrayal of high school principal Waldo Weatherbee in the CW TV series Riverdale for 7 seasons (2017 - 2023) and as the Army Chief of Staff in Sonic the Hedgehog: The Movie (2020) and as Senior FBI Agent in Longlegs. He has recently Guest Starred in the popular TV shows Tracker, The Irrational, Alert and Fire Country as well as other well-known shows such as Bates Motel, The Dead Zone, The Outer Limits, The X-Files, Spooksville, Smallville, Supernatural, The Good Doctor, Psych, Arrow, and The Flash. He had appearances in Jumanji (1995), Scary Movie (2000), and The Fantastic Four (2005) as well.
